name: Deploy AI Model to Azure ML

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main

jobs:
  deploy:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Set up Python
        uses: actions/setup-python@v5
        with:
          python-version: '3.10'

      - name: Install dependencies
        run: pip install azure-ai-ml

      - name: Azure Login
        uses: azure/login@v2
        with:
          # Use secrets for your Azure credentials (see notes below)
          client-id: ${{ secrets.AZURE_CLIENT_ID }}
          tenant-id: ${{ secrets.AZURE_TENANT_ID }}
          subscription-id: ${{ secrets.AZURE_SUBSCRIPTION_ID }}

      - name: Deploy Model to Azure ML
        env:
          AZURE_ML_WORKSPACE: "<your-ml-workspace-name>"
          AZURE_ML_RESOURCE_GROUP: "<your-resource-group>"
        run: |
          python deploy_to_azureml.py
